articles.author: Yaseen Rana
articles.title: ENG v IRE: Final ODI abandoned six hours early after groundstaff struggle to cover pitch during torrential rain - Wisden
articles.description: The third England-Ireland ODI was brought to a premature end after a brief but torrential downpour in Bristol. Read more
articles.content: The third England-Ireland ODI the final international of the 2023 summer was brought to a premature end after a brief but torrential downpour in Bristol rendered the surface unplayable as local groun… [+2084 chars]
